018package org.opengis.referencing;
019
020import org.opengis.annotation.UML;
021import org.opengis.util.CodeList;
022import org.opengis.geoapi.internal.Vocabulary;
023
024import static org.opengis.annotation.Obligation.*;
025import static org.opengis.annotation.Specification.ISO_19115;
026
027
028/**
029 * Defines type of reference system used.
030 *
031 * @author  ISO 19115 (for abstract model and documentation)
032 * @author  Rémi Maréchal (Geomatys)
033 * @version 3.1
034 * @since   3.1
035 */
036@Vocabulary(capacity=28)
037@UML(identifier="MD_ReferenceSystemTypeCode", specification=ISO_19115)
038public final class ReferenceSystemType extends CodeList<ReferenceSystemType> {
039    /**
040     * Serial number for compatibility with different versions.
041     */
042    private static final long serialVersionUID = 5574086630226193267L;
043
044    /**
045     * Compound spatio-parametric coordinate reference system containing an
046     * engineering coordinate reference system and a parametric reference system.
047     *
048     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> x, y, pressure.</div>
049     */
050    @UML(identifier="compoundEngineeringParametric", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
051    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_PARAMETRIC =
052            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_PARAMETRIC");
053
054    /**
055     * Compound spatio-parametric-temporal coordinate reference system containing an
056     * engineering, a parametric and a temporal coordinate reference system.
057     *
058     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> x, y, pressure, time.</div>
059     */
060    @UML(identifier="compoundEngineeringParametricTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
061    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_PARAMETRIC_TEMPORAL =
062            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_PARAMETRIC_TEMPORAL");
063
064    /**
065     * Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing an
066     * engineering coordinate reference system and a temporal reference system.
067     *
068     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> x, y, time.</div>
069     */
070    @UML(identifier="compoundEngineeringTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
071    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_TEMPORAL =
072            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_TEMPORAL");
073
074    /**
075     * Compound spatial reference system containing a horizontal engineering
076     * coordinate reference system and a vertical coordinate reference system.
077     *
078     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> x, y, height.</div>
079     */
080    @UML(identifier="compoundEngineeringVertical", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
081    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_VERTICAL =
082            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_VERTICAL");
083
084    /**
085     * Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing an
086     * engineering, a vertical, and a temporal coordinate reference system.
087     *
088     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> x, y, height, time.</div>
089     */
090    @UML(identifier="compoundEngineeringVerticalTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
091    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_VERTICAL_TEMPORAL =
092            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_ENGINEERING_VERTICAL_TEMPORAL");
093
094    /**
095     * Compound spatio-parametric coordinate reference system containing a 2D
096     * geographic horizontal coordinate reference system and a parametric reference system.
097     *
098     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> latitude, longitude, pressure.</div>
099     */
100    @UML(identifier="compoundGeographic2DParametric", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
101    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_PARAMETRIC =
102            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_PARAMETRIC");
103
104    /**
105     * Compound spatio-parametric-temporal coordinate reference system containing a 2D
106     * geographic horizontal, a parametric and a temporal coordinate reference system.
107     *
108     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> latitude, longitude, pressure, time.</div>
109     */
110    @UML(identifier="compoundGeographic2DParametricTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
111    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_PARAMETRIC_TEMPORAL =
112            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_PARAMETRIC_TEMPORAL");
113
114    /**
115     * Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing a 2D geographic horizontal
116     * coordinate reference system and a temporal reference system.
117     *
118     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> latitude, longitude, time.</div>
119     */
120    @UML(identifier="compoundGeographic2DTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
121    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_TEMPORAL =
122            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_TEMPORAL");
123
124    /**
125     * Compound coordinate reference system in which one constituent coordinate
126     * reference system is a horizontal geodetic coordinate reference system
127     * and one is a vertical coordinate reference system.
128     *
129     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> latitude, longitude, [gravity related] height or depth.</div>
130     */
131    @UML(identifier="compoundGeographic2DVertical", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
132    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_VERTICAL =
133            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_VERTICAL");
134
135    /**
136     * Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing a 2D
137     * geographic horizontal, a vertical, and a temporal coordinate reference system.
138     *
139     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> latitude, longitude, height, time.</div>
140     */
141    @UML(identifier="compoundGeographic2DVerticalTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
142    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_VERTICAL_TEMPORAL =
143            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC2D_VERTICAL_TEMPORAL");
144
145    /**
146     * Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing a 3D
147     * geographic and temporal coordinate reference system.
148     *
149     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> latitude, longitude, ellipsoidal height, time.</div>
150     */
151    @UML(identifier="compoundGeographic3DTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
152    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC3D_TEMPORAL =
153            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_GEOGRAPHIC3D_TEMPORAL");
154
155    /**
156     * Compound spatio-parametric coordinate reference system containing a
157     * projected horizontal coordinate reference system and a parametric reference system.
158     *
159     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> easting, northing, density.</div>
160     */
161    @UML(identifier="compoundProjected2DParametric", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
162    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_PROJECTED2D_PARAMETRIC =
163            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_PROJECTED2D_PARAMETRIC");
164
165    /**
166     * Compound statio-parametric-temporal coordinate reference system containing
167     * a projected horizontal, a parametric, and a temporal coordinate reference system.
168     *
169     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> easting, northing, density, time.</div>
170     */
171    @UML(identifier="compoundProjected2DParametricTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
172    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_PROJECTED2D_PARAMETRIC_TEMPORAL =
173            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_PROJECTED2D_PARAMETRIC_TEMPORAL");
174
175    /**
176     * Compound spatio-temporal reference system containing a projected horizontal and a temporal coordinate
177     * reference system.
178     *
179     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> easting, northing, time.</div>
180     */
181    @UML(identifier="compoundProjectedTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
182    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_PROJECTED_TEMPORAL =
183            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_PROJECTED_TEMPORAL");
184
185    /**
186     * Compound spatial reference system containing a horizontal projected coordinate
187     * reference system and a vertical coordinate reference.
188     *
189     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> easting, northing, height or depth.</div>
190     */
191    @UML(identifier="compoundProjectedVertical", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
192    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_PROJECTED_VERTICAL =
193            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_PROJECTED_VERTICAL");
194
195    /**
196     * Compound spatio-temporal coordinate reference system containing a projected horizontal,
197     * a vertical, and a temporal coordinate reference system.
198     *
199     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> easting, northing, height, time.</div>
200     */
201    @UML(identifier="compoundProjectedVerticalTemporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
202    public static final ReferenceSystemType COMPOUND_PROJECTED_VERTICAL_TEMPORAL =
203            new ReferenceSystemType("COMPOUND_PROJECTED_VERTICAL_TEMPORAL");
204
205    /**
206     * Coordinate reference system based on an engineering datum (datum describing
207     * the relationship of a coordinate system to a local reference).
208     */
209    @UML(identifier="engineering", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
210    public static final ReferenceSystemType ENGINEERING=
211            new ReferenceSystemType("ENGINEERING");
212
213    /**
214     * Engineering coordinate reference system in which the base representation
215     * of a moving object is specified.
216     */
217    @UML(identifier="engineeringDesign", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
218    public static final ReferenceSystemType ENGINEERING_DESIGN =
219            new ReferenceSystemType("ENGINEERING_DESIGN");
220
221    /**
222     * Coordinate reference system based on an image datum (engineering datum which
223     * defines the relationship of a coordinate reference system to an image).
224     *
225     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> row, column.</div>
226     */
227    @UML(identifier="engineeringImage", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
228    public static final ReferenceSystemType ENGINEERING_IMAGE =
229            new ReferenceSystemType("ENGINEERING_IMAGE");
230
231    /**
232     * Geodetic CRS having a 3D cartesian coordinate system.
233     *
234     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> [geocentric] X, Y, Z.</div>
235     */
236    @UML(identifier="geodeticGeocentric", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
237    public static final ReferenceSystemType GEODETIC_GEOCENTRIC =
238            new ReferenceSystemType("GEODETIC_GEOCENTRIC");
239
240    /**
241     * Geodetic CRS having an ellipsoidal 2D coordinate system.
242     */
243    @UML(identifier="geodeticGeographic2D", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
244    public static final ReferenceSystemType GEODETIC_GEOGRAPHIC_2D =
245            new ReferenceSystemType("GEODETIC_GEOGRAPHIC_2D");
246
247    /**
248     * Geodetic CRS having an ellipsoidal 3D coordinate system.
249     */
250    @UML(identifier="geodeticGeographic3D", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
251    public static final ReferenceSystemType GEODETIC_GEOGRAPHIC_3D =
252            new ReferenceSystemType("GEODETIC_GEOGRAPHIC_3D");
253
254    /**
255     * Spatial reference in the form of a label  or code that identifies a location.
256     *
257     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> post code.</div>
258     */
259    @UML(identifier="geographicIdentifier", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
260    public static final ReferenceSystemType GEOGRAPHIC_IDENTIFIER =
261            new ReferenceSystemType("GEOGRAPHIC_IDENTIFIER");
262
263    /**
264     * Set of Linear Referencing Methods and the policies, records and procedures
265     * for implementing them reference system that identifies a location by reference
266     * to a segment of a linear geographic feature and distance along that segment from a given point.
267     *
268     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> <var>x</var> km along road.</div>
269     */
270    @UML(identifier="linear", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
271    public static final ReferenceSystemType LINEAR =
272            new ReferenceSystemType("LINEAR");
273
274    /**
275     * Coordinate reference system based on a parametric datum (datum describing
276     * the relationship of parametric coordinate reference system to an object).
277     *
278     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> pressure.</div>
279     */
280    @UML(identifier="parametric", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
281    public static final ReferenceSystemType PARAMETRIC =
282            new ReferenceSystemType("PARAMETRIC");
283
284    /**
285     * Coordinate reference system derived from a two dimensional geodetic coordinate
286     * reference system by applying a map projection.
287     *
288     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> easting, northing.</div>
289     */
290    @UML(identifier="projected", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
291    public static final ReferenceSystemType PROJECTED =
292            new ReferenceSystemType("PROJECTED");
293
294    /**
295     * Reference system against which time is measured.
296     *
297     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> time.</div>
298     */
299    @UML(identifier="temporal", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
300    public static final ReferenceSystemType TEMPORAL =
301            new ReferenceSystemType("TEMPORAL");
302
303    /**
304     * One-dimensional coordinate reference system based on a vertical datum.
305     * Vertical datums describe the relation of gravity-related heights or depths to the planet.
306     *
307     * <div class="note"><b>Example:</b> height or depths.</div>
308     */
309    @UML(identifier="vertical", obligation=CONDITIONAL, specification=ISO_19115)
310    public static final ReferenceSystemType VERTICAL =
311            new ReferenceSystemType("VERTICAL");
312
313    /**
314     * Constructs an element of the given name.
315     *
316     * @param name  the name of the new element. This name shall not be in use by another element of this type.
317     */
318    private ReferenceSystemType(final String name) {
319        super(name);
320    }
321
322    /**
323     * Returns the list of {@code ReferenceSystemType}s.
324     *
325     * @return the list of codes declared in the current JVM.
326     */
327    public static ReferenceSystemType[] values() {
328        return values(ReferenceSystemType.class);
329    }
330
331    /**
332     * Returns the list of codes of the same kind as this code list element.
333     * Invoking this method is equivalent to invoking {@link #values()}, except that
334     * this method can be invoked on an instance of the parent {@code CodeList} class.
335     *
336     * @return all code {@linkplain #values() values} for this code list.
337     */
338    @Override
339    public ReferenceSystemType[] family() {
340        return values();
341    }
342
343    /**
344     * Returns the {@link ReferenceSystemType} that matches the given string, or returns a new one if none match it.
345     * This methods returns the first instance (in declaration order) for which the {@linkplain #name() name}
346     * is {@linkplain String#equalsIgnoreCase(String) equals, ignoring case}, to the given name.
347     * If no existing instance is found, then a new one is created for the given name.
348     *
349     * @param  code  the name of the code to fetch or to create.
350     * @return a code matching the given name.
351     */
352    public static ReferenceSystemType valueOf(String code) {
353        return valueOf(ReferenceSystemType.class, code, ReferenceSystemType::new).get();
354    }
355}
